episodes.title: Incest Marriages - The Order | Escaping Polygamy
episodes.description:
Ava is 17 and she wants to escape The Order, where she would be arranged to marry her 19-year-old cousin. Incest marriages in The Order, or The Latter Day Church of Christ, often occur when female members turn 15.

episodes.title: FLDS Megan | Escaping Polygamy
episodes.description:
Megan was born and raised in Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints (FLDS). In her religion, she learnt that she cannot choose whom to marry, or she will face death. However, Megan hopes to marry Chris someday.

episodes.description:

episodes.title: Discussing About Deceptions in Scientology | Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
episodes.description:
Leah and Mike discuss Scientology's money-related cons and why David Miscavige doesn't come out in public in this look back at "Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath."

About Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath

Leah Remini stunned the world by abruptly leaving Scientology after 34 years. But that was only the beginning. In 2015, her memoir “Troublemaker” broke all records in media - it was declared a blockbuster by the New York Times, immediately landing atop their bestseller list. Americans simply can't get enough of Leah Remini. Now Leah is bringing her shocking story to Crime + Investigation™ for a documentary series. As a reluctant advocate, she will help rescue Scientologists desperate to leave the Church. She'll also tell the story of her dramatic and often painful personal journey through Scientology, from joining at age 9 to abruptly leaving in 2013. Each episode features stories from former members, including past high level Scientology executives and Church members, whose lives have been affected by the Church’s harmful practices, even well after they left the organization. Along with a team of former high-ranking Scientology insiders who understand the inner workings and policies of the organization, Leah gives the victims a chance to be heard.

Watch more on C+I

Find out more on http://www.citvasia.com

episodes.title: Hard to Change Accustomed Mindsets | Leah Remini: Scientology and the Aftermath
